metadata.synopsis: Daisy reacts to seeing an illithid sculpture of the Grand Design.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Solve the Colony's illithid Vault puzzle (use "oe COL_Vault_AutoSolve")- Walk over to the large vault door and interact with the Grand Design sculpture at the ledge- After that dialog finishes, each user will get this Daisy AD once.

0.text: The Grand Design. The restoration of the mind flayer empire. The dream of all illithids.
